title: How do i change Region?
body:
I'm currently playing on EUNE but want to transfer to EUW

Started on EUNE due to having nordic friends but they don't play as much anymore, so want to swtich to servers closer to me

I used to see an icon on the shop section of the game, but cannot find it now

Can someone help?

replies.body: I just looked, and I was able to see transfers for EUW and EUNE.  Are you still having this issue, and have you tried re-logging yet?  Let me know!
under what TAB do i look under in the shop

Go to the store, and on the top right you'll see an icon n the top right that looks like a profile with a gear next to it.  If you highlight it, it will say Account.  You will see account specific store options there!
